trans-unit.source: Represents a common dialog that allows the user to specify a filename to save a file as.
trans-unit.target: 表示通用對話方塊，可讓使用者指定要將檔案儲存為的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: SaveFileDialog cannot be used by an application that is executing under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: SaveFileDialog 無法供部分信任下執行的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a SaveFileDialog for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winvista-md.md)].

![Save As dialog box](~/add/media/dialogboxesoverviewfigure3.png "Save As dialog box") Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location.
trans-unit.target: ![另存新檔 對話方塊](~/add/media/dialogboxesoverviewfigure3.png "另存新檔 對話方塊")從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)]、 開啟和儲存檔案 對話方塊中，有**我的最愛連結**面板上，可讓使用者快速巡覽至不同的位置 對話方塊的左半部。

trans-unit.source: These links are called custom places.
trans-unit.target: 這些連結會呼叫自訂位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.CustomPlaces%2A> property to set this list of links.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.CustomPlaces%2A>屬性來設定這個連結清單。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.CustomPlaces%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用量您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref> prompts the user for permission to create a file if the user specifies a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>會提示使用者輸入建立檔案，如果使用者指定不存在的檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if dialog should prompt prior to saving to a filename that did not previously exist; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果對話方塊應該提示您輸入儲存成原本不存在; 檔案名稱之前，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a read-write file stream for the filename selected by the user using <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立讀取 / 寫入檔案資料流以供使用者使用選取的檔名<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The file stream that is returned is opened with read-write access (<xref:System.IO.FileMode> and <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>).
trans-unit.target: 會傳回檔案資料流開啟具有讀寫存取權 (<xref:System.IO.FileMode>和<xref:System.IO.FileAccess>)。</xref:System.IO.FileAccess> </xref:System.IO.FileMode>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains the selected file.
No files were selected in the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 在對話方塊中不選取的任何檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref> displays a warning if the user specifies the name of a file that already exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>顯示警告訊息，如果使用者指定的名稱已存在的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if dialog should prompt prior to saving over a filename that previously existed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該會提示對話方塊前的先前儲存在檔案名稱才會存在;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resets all <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 重設所有<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>成為其預設值的屬性。
